_comment: This should show a block with 9 different small blocks in it (8 in the corners, 1 in the center)

offset_from_opposing_corner._comment: No rotation, using offset from opposing corner (default) origin

offset_from_opposing_corner_with_post_ro._comment: Post-rotation and translation from opposing corner origin

rotation_and_offset_from_corner._comment: Rotation over corner origin and translation

offset_from_manual_corner._comment: Translation from a manually-defined corner origin

offset_and_post_rotation_from_manual_cen._comment: Post-rotation and translation from a manually-defined center origin

offset_from_custom_origin._comment: Translation from a manually-defined custom origin

only_scale._comment: No custom translations, rotations, or origins

upside_down_anvil._comment: Rotation and no translation, over center origin
